title: Which American city could potentially adopt a canal system to combat rising tides?
teaser: In this North American city, rising tides could mean trouble â€” in a hundred years, at least. That's why a group of sustainability experts have drafted a plan that adapts to rising sea levels rather than fighting them. The key is canals. For this week's Geo Quiz, we're looking for the city which could someday become North America's very own Venice.
